message.raw:
Replaced Ogre::SharedPtr constructor calls with 0 arguments

Using the "SharedPtr() : pRep(0), pInfo(0) {}" constructor instead prevents
"Error: no matching function for call to Ogre::SharedPtr<...>::SharedPtr(int)".
